string.value: After I get done touring around Ludibrium, I should start up a conversation with Marcel
Marcel offered to take me to El Nath. Once I get there, he advised me to look for Scadur...
I was able to meet up with Scadur. Where will I go next?
Was Ludibrium a blast? Isn't it just a fun place to be around? Now, ready to go to the next spot?
Alright, I'll send you to El Nath, a land covered in snow.
Once you arrive there, talk to #eScadur#n, and he'll take you to another spot.
Oh yes, if you step outside, you'll be encountering massive, violent wolves wandering around town, so unless you're really powerful, you won't even be able to hit them once!
Oh, you like it here, huh? Make yourself comfortable then~
After taking care of your business here, just talk to me, and I'll take you to another spot.
Welcome! Marcel told me of your arrival. Well, there's not much here besides snow, so check it out! Watch your step--it's slippery!
